data.name: Tactical Battle Chronicles: Prelude to a War
data.detailed_description:
Tactical Battle Chronicles: Prelude to a war is a turn-based tactical rpg where you control a small group of fighters. Recruit allies and defeat your enemies to drive the bandits off.

Recruit Allies

You can't defeat the bandits alone. Encounter friendly fighters and reluctant enemies and persuade them to join you in your quest to gain new tactical options.

Command Your Units

Positioning your units carefully is key. Block your enemies to protect weak allied units or use your strong fighters to lure in enemy units to split up the bandits' forces. Fight wisely to defeat your opponents despite unfavourable odds.

Choose Your Difficulty

Choose between normal difficulty where death is permanent or easy where fallen units return at the end of each mission.

Complete Objectives

  • Defeat Commanders
  • Defend Buildings
  • Free Captives
  • And More
Complete a variety of objectives to win battles and turn the tides on your opponents throughout the 6-8 hour campaign.
